title: SOLD:1886 Leslie's Illustrated - New York (NL) BB Club Woodcut w/6 HOF'ers
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: SOLD:1886 Leslie's Illustrated - New York (NL) BB Club Woodcut w/6 HOF'ers
posts.post_content:
Good Evening, Collectors:

Up for sale tonight is a very scarce 1886 Leslie's Illustrated Woodcut picturing 14 members of the New York (NL) Baseball Club including 6 Hall of Famers: Buck Ewing, Tim Keefe, Roger Connor, Mickey Welch, John Ward & Jim O'Rourke. The Leslie's Illustrated baseball woodcuts are much rarer than the Harper's Weekly woodcuts. Please review scans for condition details. Sale price on this beauty is $SOLD dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]
